full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 745 Filed 08/10/22 Page 206 of 264 617 LC1Qmax6 Jane - Redirect forever. Q. You were asked on cross-examination about your memories of being sexually abused. Do you remember those questions? A. Yes. Q. How old were you when you first touched Jeffrey Epstein's penis? A. 14. Q. Can you describe for the jury how you touched his penis when you were 14? MS. MENNINGER: Your Honor, this exceeds the scope of cross. I didn't ask this question. MS. MOE: Your Honor, I believe there were questions on cross-examination about whether she remembers details how strong those memories are. THE COURT: Overruled. MS. MOE: Thank you, your Honor. THE COURT: You may answer. A. I mean, how do you touch a penis, you put your hand around it? Q. And what would you do when you touched his penis when you were 14? A. Umm, masturbate him? Q. Who would give you instructions about what to do during incidents when Jeffrey Epstein sexually abused you when you were 14? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012226
